
.. _api:

API
===

This section describes all the high level interface modules found in the
:mod:`bare68k` package. The classes wrap the low-level machine interface
and offer a object-oriented access with lots of convenience methods.


The Runtime
-----------

.. module:: bare68k

.. autoclass:: Runtime
   :members:

.. autoclass:: CPUConfig
   :members:

.. autoclass:: MemoryConfig
   :members:

.. autoclass:: RunConfig
   :members:

.. autoclass:: EventHandler
   :members:
